pkgmetadata.longdescription: Correlated Weighted Hochberg // Perform additional multiple testing procedure methods to p.adjust(), such as weighted Hochberg (Tamhane, A. C., Liu, L., 2008) doi:10.1093/biomet/asn018, ICC adjusted Bonferroni method (Shi, Q., Pavey, E. S., Carter, R. E., 2012) doi:10.1002/pst.1514 and a new correlation corrected weighted Hochberg for correlated endpoints.
